#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long n;
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    int s;
    s=0;
    while(n!=0)
    {
        if(n%2==0)
        {
            n=n/2;
        }
        else
        {
            n=n/2;
            s++;
        }
    }
    printf("%d\n",s);
    return 0;
}
